title: Unix Socket Description
description: Unix server sockets shall be described in more detail below. Unix client sockets with an outgoing connection do not need to be described.

sockets.name: <path to third-party-snap>/<third-party-snap-name>.<service>.sock, service: e.g. `web`.
sockets.purpose: This Unix server socket is used by the App for serving REST calls from the Snap mapped through the ctrlX Caddy proxy.
